title: Assassin's Creed Shadows: Claws of Awaji
overview: Travel to a new distinctive region - the island of Awaji - a place of mysterious beauty. Reclaim a lost treasure while avoiding the traps and ambushes of deadly new foes. Feel the tension of being hunted by a new faction, threatening the mysterious island of Awaji. Master the B≈ç, a new weapon type for Naoe, unlock new skills, gear, and abilities.
